name: Zolga the Prophet
text: If you control an EARTH Fairy monster other than "Zolga the Prophet": You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then look at up to 5 cards from the top of each Deck. When a monster Normal Summoned by Tributing this card declares an attack: You can banish this card from your GY; destroy that monster, and if you do, inflict 2000 damage to your opponent. You can only use each effect of "Zolga the Prophet" once per turn.
